body: [http://www.ladybug.tools/Honeybee/Pollination](http://www.ladybug.tools/Honeybee/Pollination) I believe the link above brings you to the pollination tool developed by honeybee but i am have trouble accessing it. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4jwXaSgOoWo*YswfzxyyyR2eZpbC*Sr8wbvDXzu6Qr9cn0qHYlsk5XCeu0BL3KaBgd1lUPxym9-wJbZygwPniyF9YRb4R9wK/13.JPG)I am not sure if i have the wrong URL or if there is any additional step i have to do.

replies.body: github is case sensitive and we have changed "Honeybee" to "honeybee". Try [http://www.ladybug.tools/honeybee/Pollination](http://www.ladybug.tools/honeybee/Pollination)
I am wondering if there is anyway to set the boundaries of the axis rather than max and min of the corresponding values?

Use Design Explorer. [http://tt-acm.github.io/DesignExplorer/](http://tt-acm.github.io/DesignExplorer/)

You can zoom to selection which does what you want and much more.
